properties.title: Process identifier
properties.description: Unique identifier of the process definition.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: Unique identifier of the element.

properties.title: 名称
properties.description: 描述该元素的名称

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: The descriptive name of the BPMN element.

properties.title: Target namespace
properties.description: Target namespace for the process definition.

properties.title: Asynchronous
properties.description: Define the activity as asynchronous.

properties.title: Exclusive
properties.description: Define the activity as exclusive.

properties.title: Execution listeners
properties.description: Listeners for an activity, process, sequence flow, start and end event.

properties.title: Task listeners
properties.description: Listeners for a user task

properties.title: Event listeners
properties.description: Listeners for any event happening in the Activiti Engine. It's also possible to rethrow the event as a signal, message or error event

properties.title: 审批人员配置
properties.description: Assignment definition for the user task

properties.title: 会签通过率
properties.description: 会签通过率

properties.title: Due date
properties.description: Due date of the user task.

properties.title: Due date
properties.description: Due date of the user task.

properties.title: Rules
properties.description: Rules of the rule task.

properties.title: Input variables
properties.description: Input variables of the rule task.

properties.title: Exclude
properties.description: Use the rules property as exclusion.

properties.title: Result variable
properties.description: Result variable of the rule task.

properties.title: To
properties.description: The recipients if the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list.

properties.title: From
properties.description: The sender e-mail address. If not provided, the default configured from address is used.

properties.title: Subject
properties.description: The subject of the e-mail.

properties.title: Cc
properties.description: The cc's of the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list

properties.title: Bcc
properties.description: The bcc's of the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list

properties.title: Text
properties.description: The content of the e-mail, in case one needs to send plain none-rich e-mails. Can be used in combination with html, for e-mail clients that don't support rich content. The client will then fall back to this text-only alternative.

properties.title: Html
properties.description: A piece of HTML that is the content of the e-mail.

properties.title: Charset
properties.description: Allows to change the charset of the email, which is necessary for many non-English languages.

properties.title: Called element
properties.description: Process reference.

properties.title: In parameters
properties.description: Definition of the input parameters

properties.title: Out parameters
properties.description: Definition of the output parameters

properties.title: Camel context
properties.description: An optional camel context definition, if left empty the default is used.

properties.title: Endpoint url
properties.description: A required endpoint url to sent the message to Mule.

properties.title: Language
properties.description: A required definition for the language to resolve the payload expression, like juel.

properties.title: Payload expression
properties.description: A required definition for the payload of the message sent to Mule.

properties.title: Result variable
properties.description: An optional result variable for the payload returned.

properties.title: 顺序流条件
properties.description: 设置满足经过顺序流的条件

properties.title: 默认顺序流
properties.description: 默认工作流方向指的是由“排他网关”流出的方向，存在多个流向，若条件都不满足所执行的方向

properties.title: Conditional flow
properties.description: Define the sequence flow with a condition

properties.title: Time cycle (e.g. R3/PT10H)
properties.description: Define the timer with a ISO-8601 cycle.

properties.title: Time date in ISO-8601
properties.description: Define the timer with a ISO-8601 date definition.

properties.title: Initiator
properties.description: Initiator of the process.

properties.title: Text
properties.description: The text of the text annotation.

properties.title: Multi-instance type
properties.description: Repeated activity execution (parallel or sequential) can be displayed through different loop types

properties.title: Cardinality (Multi-instance)
properties.description: Define the cardinality of multi instance.

properties.title: Collection (Multi-instance)
properties.description: Define the collection for the multi instance.

properties.title: Element variable (Multi-instance)
properties.description: Define the element variable for the multi instance.

properties.title: Completion condition (Multi-instance)
properties.description: Define the completion condition for the multi instance.

properties.title: 是否补偿
properties.description: A flag that identifies whether this activity is intended for the purposes of compensation.

properties.title: Flow order
properties.description: Order outgoing sequence flows.

properties.title: Signal definitions
properties.description: Signal definitions

properties.title: Message definitions
properties.description: Message definitions

properties.title: Is a transaction sub process
properties.description: A flag that identifies whether this sub process is of type transaction.

properties.title: Terminate all
properties.description: Enable to terminate the process instance

stencils.title: BPMN-Diagram
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
   width="800"
   height="600"
   version="1.0">
  <defs></defs>
  <g pointer-events="fill" >
    <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />
    <rect id="diagramcanvas" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="790" height="590" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white" />
    	<text font-size="22" id="diagramtext" x="400" y="25" oryx:align="top center" stroke="#373e48"></text>
  </g>
</svg>

stencils.title: 开始
stencils.description: A start event without a specific trigger
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   width="40"
   height="40"
   version="1.0">
  <defs></defs>
  <oryx:magnets>
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />
  </oryx:magnets>
  <g pointer-events="fill">
    <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="#585858" fill="#ffffff" stroke-width="1"/>
	<text font-size="11" 
		id="text_name" 
		x="16" y="33" 
		oryx:align="top center" 
		stroke="#373e48"
	></text>
  </g>
</svg>

stencils.title: 结束
stencils.description: An end event without a specific trigger
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   width="40"
   height="40"
   version="1.0">
  <defs></defs>
  <oryx:magnets>
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />
  </oryx:magnets>
  <g pointer-events="fill">
    <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="#585858" fill="#ffffff" stroke-width="3"/>
	<text font-size="11" 
		id="text_name" 
		x="16" y="32" 
		oryx:align="top center" 
		stroke="#373e48"
	></text>
  </g>
</svg>

stencils.title: 用户节点
stencils.description: A manual task assigned to a specific person
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"

   width="102"
   height="82"
   version="1.0">
  <defs></defs>
  <oryx:magnets>
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />
  </oryx:magnets>
  <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40">
	<rect id="text_frame" oryx:anchors="bottom top right left" x="1" y="1" width="94" height="79" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="none" stroke-width="0" fill="none" />
	<rect id="bg_frame" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#bbbbbb" stroke-width="1" fill="#f9f9f9" />
		<text 
			font-size="12" 
			id="text_name" 
			x="50" 
			y="40" 
			oryx:align="middle center"
			oryx:fittoelem="text_frame"
			stroke="#373e48">
		</text>
	
	<g id="userTask" transform="translate(3,3)">
		<path oryx:anchors="top left"
       		style="fill:#d1b575;stroke:none;"
       		 d="m 1,17 16,0 0,-1.7778 -5.333332,-3.5555 0,-1.7778 c 1.244444,0 1.244444,-2.3111 1.244444,-2.3111 l 0,-3.0222 C 12.555557,0.8221 9.0000001,1.0001 9.0000001,1.0001 c 0,0 -3.5555556,-0.178 -3.9111111,3.5555 l 0,3.0222 c 0,0 0,2.3111 1.2444443,2.3111 l 0,1.7778 L 1,15.2222 1,17 17,17" 
         />
		
	</g>
  
	<g id="parallel">
		<path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="#bbbbbb" d="M46 70 v8 M50 70 v8 M54 70 v8" stroke-width="2" />
	</g>
	
	<g id="sequential">
		<path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="#bbbbbb" stroke-width="2" d="M46,76h10M46,72h10 M46,68h10"/>
	</g>
	

	<g id="compensation">
		<path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="#bbbbbb" d="M 62 74 L 66 70 L 66 78 L 62 74 L 62 70 L 58 74 L 62 78 L 62 74" stroke-width="1" />
	</g>
  </g>
</svg>

stencils.title: 排他网关
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   version="1.0"
   width="40"
   height="40">
  <defs
     id="defs4" />
  <oryx:magnets>
    <oryx:magnet
       oryx:default="yes"
       oryx:cy="16"
       oryx:cx="16" />
  </oryx:magnets>					
  <g>
  
    <path
       d="M -4.5,16 L 16,-4.5 L 35.5,16 L 16,35.5z"
       id="bg_frame"
       fill="#ffffff"
       stroke="#585858"
       style="stroke-width:1" />
    <g
       id="cross">
      <path
      	id="crosspath"
      	stroke="#585858"
      	fill="#585858"
        d="M 8.75,7.55 L 12.75,7.55 L 23.15,24.45 L 19.25,24.45 z"
        style="stroke-width:1" />
      <path
      	id="crosspath2"
      	stroke="#585858"
      	fill="#585858"
        d="M 8.75,24.45 L 19.25,7.55 L 23.15,7.55 L 12.75,24.45 z"
        style="stroke-width:1" />
    </g>
	
	<text id="text_name" x="26" y="26" oryx:align="left top"/>
	
  </g>
</svg>

stencils.title: Sequence flow
stencils.description: Sequence flow defines the execution order of activities.
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
	xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
	xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
	version="1.0"
	oryx:edge="edge" >
	<defs>
	  	<marker id="start" refX="1" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="17" markerHeight="11" orient="auto">
	  		<!-- <path id="conditional"   d="M 0 6 L 8 1 L 15 5 L 8 9 L 1 5" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" /> -->
			<path id="default" d="M 5 0 L 11 10" fill="white" stroke="#585858" stroke-width="1" />
	  	</marker>
	  	<marker id="end" refX="15" refY="6" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="15" markerHeight="12" orient="auto">
	  		<path id="arrowhead" d="M 0 1 L 15 6 L 0 11z" fill="#585858" stroke="#585858" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" />
	  	</marker>
	</defs>
	<g id="edge">
		<path id="bg_frame" d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="#585858" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" marker-start="url(#start)" marker-end="url(#end)" />
		<text id="text_name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>
	</g>
</svg>

stencils.title: Message flow
stencils.description: Message flow to connect elements in different pools.
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
	xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
	xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
	version="1.0"
	oryx:edge="edge" >
	<defs>
		<marker id="start" oryx:optional="yes" oryx:enabled="yes" refX="5" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">
	  		<!-- <path d="M 10 10 L 0 5 L 10 0" fill="none" stroke="#585858" /> -->
	  		<circle id="arrowhead" cx="5" cy="5" r="5" fill="white" stroke="black" />
	  	</marker>

	  	<marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">
	  		<path id="arrowhead2" d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 L 0 0" fill="white" stroke="#585858" />
	  	</marker>
	</defs>
	<g id="edge">
	    <path id="bg_frame" d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="#585858" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" marker-start="url(#start)" marker-end="url(#end)" />
		<text id="text_name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>
	</g>
</svg>

stencils.title: Association
stencils.description: Associates a text annotation with an element.
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
	xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
	xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
	version="1.0"
	oryx:edge="edge" >
	<g id="edge">
	    <path id="bg_frame" d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="#585858" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" />
		<text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop" oryx:offsetTop="6" style="font-size:9px;"/>
	</g>
</svg>

stencils.title: DataAssociation
stencils.description: Associates a data element with an activity.
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
	xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
	xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
	version="1.0"
	oryx:edge="edge" >
	<defs>
	  	<marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">
	  		<path id="arrowhead" d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10" fill="none" stroke="#585858" />
	  	</marker>
	</defs>
	<g id="edge">
	    <path id="bg_frame" d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="#585858" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" marker-end="url(#end)" />
		<text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop" oryx:offsetTop="6" style="font-size:9px;"/>
	</g>
</svg>
